column1: Domestic transport by ferry by unit, ferry route and time
The number of bicycles on some routes are very uncertain and use of
these figures on individual routes should be done with great care.
Statistics Denmark is working on improving the quality of the
statistics. For som lines lorries include trailers and semi-trailers.
